Articles.Content:
I know this may be old news to many but, where is the abandoned KSC? Is it on Kerbals equator? I faintly remember a KurtJMac video on this but don't really feel like diggin' through the history. Is there a Lat. & Long. for the location? Yeah, I'm lazy. Just wondering if there was any specific science to be drawn from it.

Edited May 19, 2014 by SpacedCowboy

http://www.kerbalmaps.com/

Turn on anomalies. The second KSC is the anomaly just to the north of the desert.

http://www.kerbalmaps.com/

Go to the upper left and check the check-box "Space Centers"

Edit: Most awesome ninja ever.
